message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $14500. This is an exceptional deal, considering the product's true worth is $15000. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding.
